Package hamlet.alexander.SpeakEasy

Class SubmissionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • hamlet.alexander.SpeakEasy.SubmissionService
  • @Service
public class SubmissionService
extends java.lang.Object
    Submission DATA ACCESS OBJECT service layer. Object that interacts with submission data coming in and out of the SUBMISSION Collection in the Mongo Database. Applys minimal business logic to ensure correct formatting.
